ygData.subject: Re: Hrmm
ygData.msgSnippet: I would just like to say that every quest ecept the high level ones that i seen thus far have not been far fro the point of where it originated. I very much
ygData.messageBody:
I would just like to say that every quest ecept the high level ones that i
seen thus far have not been far fro the point of where it originated. I very
much doubt if the 3rd book does exist that it would be more than a 1-3 zones
away. Try keeping the search if any .......more local to Akanons Contient of
Faydwer. Acording to the map there is 3 lakes to explore on this continent
one in Dagnors Cauldron (unlikey) , Wayunder Lake, and Elizerain
lake......Besides that there is some water in the greater fairdark section
(Looks like part of a river) if i do beleive to be correct I would start my
search there and work outwards to other ajacent zones. Cloverleaf <Fennin
Ro server>
